name: Fight With Keys
description:
A combination of action and rhythm games, players need to move characters while entering corresponding keys.

Note: You need to enter ANY Key to start the game. It's A -- N -- Y.

【 Game Play 】
The player uses the arrow keys to move the character. When the enemy enters the player's "circle", the key can be seen on the enemy's head. As long as the corresponding key is pressed, the enemy will be destroyed.

【 Game Features 】
The game has 10 maps, 4 difficulties, and over 30 different enemies. Enemies and maps are randomly generated. The player can play a different game each time.
